antifeatures.DisabledAlgorithm: This app has a weak security signature
antifeatures.KnownVuln: This app contains a known security vulnerability
antifeatures.NSFW: This app contains content that should not be publicized or visible everywhere
antifeatures.NoSourceSince: The source code is no longer available, no updates possible
antifeatures.NonFreeDep: This app depends on other non-free apps
antifeatures.NonFreeNet: This app promotes or depends entirely on a non-free network service
antifeatures.Tracking: This app tracks and reports your activity
antifeatures.UpstreamNonFree: The upstream source code is not entirely Free

index.introduction: F-Droid is an installable catalogue of FOSS (Free and Open Source Software) applications for the Android platform. The client makes it easy to browse, install, and keep track of updates on your device.
index.title: What is F-Droid?

package.anti_features_warning: This app has features you may not like.
package.author: Author
package.minimum_android_version: This version requires Android {{ android_version }} or newer.
package.signed_by_developer: It is built and signed by the original developer, and guaranteed to correspond to this source tarball.
package.signed_by_fdroid: It is built and signed by F-Droid, and guaranteed to correspond to this source tarball.
package.suggest_downloading_via_fdroid: Although APK downloads are available below to give you the choice, you should be aware that by installing that way you will not receive update notifications and it's a less secure way to download. We recommend that you install the F-Droid client and use that.

permissions.permdesc_acceptHandovers: Allows the app to continue a call which was started in another app.
permissions.permdesc_accessBackgroundLocation: This app can access location at any time, even while the app is not in use.
permissions.permdesc_accessCoarseLocation: This app can get your approximate location from location services while the app is in use. Location services for your device must be turned on for the app to get location.
permissions.permdesc_accessDrmCertificates: Allows an application to provision and use DRM certificates. Should never be needed for normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_accessFineLocation: This app can get your precise location from location services while the app is in use. Location services for your device must be turned on for the app to get location. This may increase battery usage.
permissions.permdesc_accessImsCallService: Allows the app to use the IMS service to make calls without your intervention.
permissions.permdesc_accessLocationExtraCommands: Allows the app to access extra location provider commands. This may allow the app to interfere with the operation of the GPS or other location sources.
permissions.permdesc_accessNetworkConditions: Allows an application to listen for observations on network conditions. Should never be needed for normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_accessNetworkState: Allows the app to view information about network connections such as which networks exist and are connected.
permissions.permdesc_accessNotifications: Allows the app to retrieve, examine, and clear notifications, including those posted by other apps.
permissions.permdesc_accessWifiState: Allows the app to view information about Wi-Fi networking, such as whether Wi-Fi is enabled and name of connected Wi-Fi devices.
permissions.permdesc_accessWimaxState: Allows the app to determine whether WiMAX is enabled and information about any WiMAX networks that are connected.
permissions.permdesc_access_notification_policy: Allows the app to read and write Do Not Disturb configuration.
permissions.permdesc_activityRecognition: This app can recognize your physical activity.
permissions.permdesc_addVoicemail: Allows the app to add messages to your voicemail inbox.
permissions.permdesc_answerPhoneCalls: Allows the app to answer an incoming phone call.
permissions.permdesc_audioWrite: Allows the app to modify your music collection.
permissions.permdesc_backgroundCamera: This app can take pictures and record videos using the camera at any time.
permissions.permdesc_bindCarrierMessagingService: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a carrier messaging service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_bindCarrierServices: Allows the holder to bind to carrier services. Should never be needed for normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_bindCellBroadcastService: Allows the app to bind to the cell broadcast module in order to forward cell broadcast messages as they are received. Cell broadcast alerts are delivered in some locations to warn you of emergency situations. Malicious apps may interfere with the performance or operation of your device when an emergency cell broadcast is received.
permissions.permdesc_bindConditionProviderService: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a condition provider service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_bindDreamService: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a dream service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_bindNotificationListenerService: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a notification listener service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_bind_connection_service: Allows the app to interact with telephony services to make/receive calls.
permissions.permdesc_bind_incall_service: Allows the app to control when and how the user sees the in-call screen.
permissions.permdesc_bluetooth: Allows the app to view the configuration of the Bluetooth on the phone, and to make and accept connections with paired devices.
permissions.permdesc_bluetoothAdmin: Allows the app to configure the local Bluetooth phone, and to discover and pair with remote devices.
permissions.permdesc_bluetooth_advertise: Allows the app to advertise to nearby Bluetooth devices
permissions.permdesc_bluetooth_connect: Allows the app to connect to paired Bluetooth devices
permissions.permdesc_bluetooth_scan: Allows the app to discover and pair nearby Bluetooth devices
permissions.permdesc_bodySensors: Allows the app to access data from sensors that monitor your physical condition, such as your heart rate.
permissions.permdesc_bodySensors_background: Allows the app to access body sensor data, such as heart rate, temperature, and blood oxygen percentage, while the app is in the background.
permissions.permdesc_broadcastSticky: Allows the app to send sticky broadcasts, which remain after the broadcast ends. Excessive use may make the phone slow or unstable by causing it to use too much memory.
permissions.permdesc_callCompanionApp: Allows the app to see and control ongoing calls on the device. This includes information such as call numbers for calls and the state of the calls.
permissions.permdesc_callPhone: Allows the app to call phone numbers without your intervention. This may result in unexpected charges or calls. Note that this doesn't allow the app to call emergency numbers. Malicious apps may cost you money by making calls without your confirmation.
permissions.permdesc_camera: This app can take pictures and record videos using the camera while the app is in use.
permissions.permdesc_cameraOpenCloseListener: This app can receive callbacks when any camera device is being opened (by what application) or closed.
permissions.permdesc_changeNetworkState: Allows the app to change the state of network connectivity.
permissions.permdesc_changeTetherState: Allows the app to change the state of tethered network connectivity.
permissions.permdesc_changeWifiMulticastState: Allows the app to receive packets sent to all devices on a Wi-Fi network using multicast addresses, not just your phone. It uses more power than the non-multicast mode.
permissions.permdesc_changeWifiState: Allows the app to connect to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to device configuration for Wi-Fi networks.
permissions.permdesc_changeWimaxState: Allows the app to connect the phone to and disconnect the phone from WiMAX networks.
permissions.permdesc_companionProfileWatch: Allows a companion app to manage watches.
permissions.permdesc_connection_manager: Allows the app to manage telecom connections.
permissions.permdesc_control_incall_experience: Allows the app to provide an in-call user experience.
permissions.permdesc_createNetworkSockets: Allows the app to create network sockets and use custom network protocols. The browser and other applications provide means to send data to the internet, so this permission is not required to send data to the internet.
permissions.permdesc_deliverCompanionMessages: Allows a companion app to deliver companion messages to other devices.
permissions.permdesc_detectScreenCapture: This app will get notified when a screenshot is taken while the app is in use.
permissions.permdesc_disableKeyguard: Allows the app to disable the keylock and any associated password security. For example, the phone disables the keylock when receiving an incoming phone call, then re-enables the keylock when the call is finished.
permissions.permdesc_enableCarMode: Allows the app to enable the car mode.
permissions.permdesc_exemptFromAudioRecordRestrictio: Exempt the app from restrictions to record audio.
permissions.permdesc_expandStatusBar: Allows the app to expand or collapse the status bar.
permissions.permdesc_foregroundService: Allows the app to make use of foreground services.
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServiceCamera: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"camera\
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServiceConnectedDevic: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"connectedDevice\
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServiceDataSync: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"dataSync\
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServiceFileManagement: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"fileManagement\
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServiceHealth: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"health\
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServiceLocation: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"location\
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServiceMediaPlayback: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"mediaPlayback\
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServiceMediaProjectio: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"mediaProjection\
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServiceMicrophone: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"microphone\
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServicePhoneCall: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"phoneCall\
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServiceRemoteMessagin: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"remoteMessaging\
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServiceSpecialUse: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"specialUse\
permissions.permdesc_foregroundServiceSystemExempted: Allows the app to make use of foreground services with the type \"systemExempted\
permissions.permdesc_fullScreenIntent: Allows the app to display notifications as full screen activities on a locked device
permissions.permdesc_getAccounts: Allows the app to get the list of accounts known by the phone. This may include any accounts created by applications you have installed.
permissions.permdesc_getPackageSize: Allows the app to retrieve its code, data, and cache sizes
permissions.permdesc_getTasks: Allows the app to retrieve information about currently and recently running tasks. This may allow the app to discover information about which applications are used on the device.
permissions.permdesc_handoverStatus: Allows this application to receive information about current Android Beam transfers
permissions.permdesc_hideOverlayWindows: This app can request that the system hides overlays originating from apps from being shown on top of it.
permissions.permdesc_highSamplingRateSensors: Allows the app to sample sensor data at a rate greater than 200 Hz
permissions.permdesc_imagesWrite: Allows the app to modify your photo collection.
permissions.permdesc_install_shortcut: Allows an application to add Homescreen shortcuts without user intervention.
permissions.permdesc_invokeCarrierSetup: Allows the holder to invoke the carrier-provided configuration app. Should never be needed for normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_killBackgroundProcesses: Allows the app to end background processes of other apps. This may cause other apps to stop running.
permissions.permdesc_manageFace: Allows the app to invoke methods to add and delete facial templates for use.
permissions.permdesc_manageFingerprint: Allows the app to invoke methods to add and delete fingerprint templates for use.
permissions.permdesc_manageNetworkPolicy: Allows the app to manage network policies and define app-specific rules.
permissions.permdesc_manageOngoingCalls: Allows an app to see details about ongoing calls on your device and to control these calls.
permissions.permdesc_manageOwnCalls: Allows the app to route its calls through the system in order to improve the calling experience.
permissions.permdesc_manageProfileAndDeviceOwners: Allows apps to set the profile owners and the device owner.
permissions.permdesc_mediaLocation: Allows the app to read locations from your media collection.
permissions.permdesc_modifyAudioSettings: Allows the app to modify global audio settings such as volume and which speaker is used for output.
permissions.permdesc_modifyNetworkAccounting: Allows the app to modify how network usage is accounted against apps. Not for use by normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_nearby_wifi_devices: Allows the app to advertise, connect, and determine the relative position of nearby Wi\u2011Fi devices
permissions.permdesc_nfc: Allows the app to communicate with Near Field Communication (NFC) tags, cards, and readers.
permissions.permdesc_observeCompanionDevicePresence: Allows a companion app to observe companion device presence when the devices are nearby or far-away.
permissions.permdesc_persistentActivity: Allows the app to make parts of itself persistent in memory. This can limit memory available to other apps slowing down the phone.
permissions.permdesc_postNotification: Allows the app to show notifications
permissions.permdesc_preferredPaymentInfo: Allows the app to get preferred nfc payment service information like registered aids and route destination.
permissions.permdesc_processOutgoingCalls: Allows the app to see the number being dialed during an outgoing call with the option to redirect the call to a different number or abort the call altogether.
permissions.permdesc_queryAllPackages: Allows an app to see all installed packages.
permissions.permdesc_readBasicPhoneState: Allows the app to access the basic telephony features of the device.
permissions.permdesc_readCalendar: This app can read all calendar events stored on your phone and share or save your calendar data.
permissions.permdesc_readCallLog: This app can read your call history.
permissions.permdesc_readCellBroadcasts: Allows the app to read cell broadcast messages received by your device. Cell broadcast alerts are delivered in some locations to warn you of emergency situations. Malicious apps may interfere with the performance or operation of your device when an emergency cell broadcast is received.
permissions.permdesc_readContacts: Allows the app to read data about your contacts stored on your phone. Apps will also have access to the accounts on your phone that have created contacts. This may include accounts created by apps you have installed. This permission allows apps to save your contact data, and malicious apps may share contact data without your knowledge.
permissions.permdesc_readHistoryBookmarks: Allows the app to read the history of all URLs that the Browser has visited, and all of the Browser's bookmarks. Note: this permission may not be enforced by third-party browsers or other applications with web browsing capabilities.
permissions.permdesc_readInstallSessions: Allows an application to read install sessions. This allows it to see details about active package installations.
permissions.permdesc_readMediaAudio: Allows the app to read audio files from your shared storage.
permissions.permdesc_readMediaImages: Allows the app to read image files from your shared storage.
permissions.permdesc_readMediaVideo: Allows the app to read video files from your shared storage.
permissions.permdesc_readNetworkUsageHistory: Allows the app to read historical network usage for specific networks and apps.
permissions.permdesc_readPhoneNumbers: Allows the app to access the phone numbers of the device.
permissions.permdesc_readPhoneState: Allows the app to access the phone features of the device. This permission allows the app to determine the phone number and device IDs, whether a call is active, and the remote number connected by a call.
permissions.permdesc_readSms: This app can read all SMS (text) messages stored on your phone.
permissions.permdesc_readSyncSettings: Allows the app to read the sync settings for an account. For example, this can determine whether the People app is synced with an account.
permissions.permdesc_readSyncStats: Allows an app to read the sync stats for an account, including the history of sync events and how much data is synced.
permissions.permdesc_readVisualUserSelect: Allows the app to read image and video files that you select from your shared storage.
permissions.permdesc_receiveBootCompleted: Allows the app to have itself started as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the app to slow down the overall phone by always running.
permissions.permdesc_receiveMms: Allows the app to receive and process MMS messages. This means the app could monitor or delete messages sent to your device without showing them to you.
permissions.permdesc_receiveSms: Allows the app to receive and process SMS messages. This means the app could monitor or delete messages sent to your device without showing them to you.
permissions.permdesc_receiveWapPush: Allows the app to receive and process WAP messages. This permission includes the ability to monitor or delete messages sent to you without showing them to you.
permissions.permdesc_recordAudio: This app can record audio using the microphone while the app is in use.
permissions.permdesc_recordBackgroundAudio: This app can record audio using the microphone at any time.
permissions.permdesc_register_call_provider: Allows the app to register new telecom connections.
permissions.permdesc_register_sim_subscription: Allows the app to register new telecom SIM connections.
permissions.permdesc_removeDrmCertificates: Allows an application to remove DRM certificates. Should never be needed for normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_reorderTasks: Allows the app to move tasks to the foreground and background. The app may do this without your input.
permissions.permdesc_requestDeletePackages: Allows an application to request deletion of packages.
permissions.permdesc_requestIgnoreBatteryOptimizatio: Allows an app to ask for permission to ignore battery optimizations for that app.
permissions.permdesc_requestInstallPackages: Allows an application to request installation of packages.
permissions.permdesc_requestPasswordComplexity: Allows the app to learn the screen lock complexity level (high, medium, low or none), which indicates the possible range of length and type of the screen lock. The app can also suggest to users that they update the screen lock to a certain level but users can freely ignore and navigate away. Note that the screen lock is not stored in plaintext so the app does not know the exact password.
permissions.permdesc_route_media_output: Allows an application to route media output to other external devices.
permissions.permdesc_runInBackground: This app can run in the background. This may drain battery faster.
permissions.permdesc_schedule_exact_alarm: This app can schedule work to happen at a desired time in the future. This also means that the app can run when you\u2019re not actively using the device.
permissions.permdesc_sdcardRead: Allows the app to read the contents of your shared storage.
permissions.permdesc_sdcardWrite: Allows the app to write the contents of your shared storage.
permissions.permdesc_sendSms: Allows the app to send SMS messages. This may result in unexpected charges. Malicious apps may cost you money by sending messages without your confirmation.
permissions.permdesc_setAlarm: Allows the app to set an alarm in an installed alarm clock app. Some alarm clock apps may not implement this feature.
permissions.permdesc_setInputCalibration: Allows the app to modify the calibration parameters of the touch screen. Should never be needed for normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_setTimeZone: Allows the app to change the phone's time zone.
permissions.permdesc_setWallpaper: Allows the app to set the system wallpaper.
permissions.permdesc_setWallpaperHints: Allows the app to set the system wallpaper size hints.
permissions.permdesc_sim_communication: Allows the app to send commands to the SIM. This is very dangerous.
permissions.permdesc_startForegroundServicesFromBack: Allows a companion app to start foreground services from background.
permissions.permdesc_startReviewPermissionDecisions: Allows the holder to start screen to review permission decisions. Should never be needed for normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_startViewAppFeatures: Allows the holder to start viewing the features info for an app.
permissions.permdesc_startViewPermissionUsage: Allows the holder to start the permission usage for an app. Should never be needed for normal apps.
permissions.permdesc_statusBar: Allows the app to disable the status bar or add and remove system icons.
permissions.permdesc_statusBarService: Allows the app to be the status bar.
permissions.permdesc_subscribedFeedsRead: Allows the app to get details about the currently synced feeds.
permissions.permdesc_systemAlertWindow: This app can appear on top of other apps or other parts of the screen. This may interfere with normal app usage and change the way that other apps appear.
permissions.permdesc_systemCamera: This privileged or system app can take pictures and record videos using a system camera at any time. Requires the android.permission.CAMERA permission to be held by the app as well
permissions.permdesc_transmitIr: Allows the app to use the phone's infrared transmitter.
permissions.permdesc_turnScreenOn: Allows the app to turn on the screen.
permissions.permdesc_uninstall_shortcut: Allows the application to remove Homescreen shortcuts without user intervention.
permissions.permdesc_updatePackagesWithoutUserAction: Allows the holder to update the app it previously installed without user action
permissions.permdesc_useBiometric: Allows the app to use biometric hardware for authentication
permissions.permdesc_useDataInBackground: This app can use data in the background. This may increase data usage.
permissions.permdesc_useFaceAuthentication: Allows the app to use face unlock hardware for authentication
permissions.permdesc_useFingerprint: Allows the app to use fingerprint hardware for authentication
permissions.permdesc_use_exact_alarm: This app can schedule actions like alarms and reminders to notify you at a desired time in the future.
permissions.permdesc_use_sip: Allows the app to make and receive SIP calls.
permissions.permdesc_uwb_ranging: Allow the app to determine relative position between nearby Ultra-Wideband devices
permissions.permdesc_vibrate: Allows the app to control the vibrator.
permissions.permdesc_vibrator_state: Allows the app to access the vibrator state.
permissions.permdesc_videoWrite: Allows the app to modify your video collection.
permissions.permdesc_wakeLock: Allows the app to prevent the phone from going to sleep.
permissions.permdesc_writeCalendar: This app can add, remove, or change calendar events on your phone. This app can send messages that may appear to come from calendar owners, or change events without notifying their owners.
permissions.permdesc_writeCallLog: Allows the app to modify your phone's call log, including data about incoming and outgoing calls. Malicious apps may use this to erase or modify your call log.
permissions.permdesc_writeContacts: Allows the app to modify the data about your contacts stored on your phone. This permission allows apps to delete contact data.
permissions.permdesc_writeGeolocationPermissions: Allows the app to modify the Browser's geolocation permissions. Malicious apps may use this to allow sending location information to arbitrary web sites.
permissions.permdesc_writeHistoryBookmarks: Allows the app to modify the Browser's history or bookmarks stored on your phone. This may allow the app to erase or modify Browser data. Note: this permission may note be enforced by third-party browsers or other applications with web browsing capabilities.
permissions.permdesc_writeSettings: Allows the app to modify the system's settings data. Malicious apps may corrupt your system's configuration.
permissions.permdesc_writeSyncSettings: Allows an app to modify the sync settings for an account. For example, this can be used to enable sync of the People app with an account.
permissions.permgroupbackgroundrequest_location: Allow the app to request background location.
permissions.permgroupbackgroundrequestdetail_locatio: App currently can access location only while you are using the app
permissions.permgroupdesc_calllog: read and write phone call log
permissions.permgroupdesc_nearby_devices: discover and connect to nearby devices
permissions.permgroupdesc_readMediaAural: access music and audio on your device
permissions.permgroupdesc_readMediaVisual: access photos and videos on your device
permissions.permgroupdesc_sensors: access sensor data about your vital signs
permissions.permgroupdesc_storage: access photos, media, and files on your device
permissions.permgrouprequest_activityRecognition: Allow the app to track your activity.
permissions.permgrouprequestdetail_location: The app will only have access to the location while you are using the app
permissions.permlab_acceptHandover: continue a call from another app
permissions.permlab_accessCoarseLocation: access approximate location only in the foreground
permissions.permlab_accessFineLocation: access precise location only in the foreground
permissions.permlab_accessNetworkConditions: listen for observations on network conditions
permissions.permlab_backgroundCamera: take pictures and videos in the background
permissions.permlab_bindCarrierMessagingService: bind to a carrier messaging service
permissions.permlab_bindConditionProviderService: bind to a condition provider service
permissions.permlab_bindNotificationListenerService: bind to a notification listener service
permissions.permlab_bluetooth_scan: discover and pair nearby Bluetooth devices
permissions.permlab_bodySensors: access body sensors (like heart rate monitors)
permissions.permlab_bodySensors_background: Access body sensor data, like heart rate, while in the background
permissions.permlab_callCompanionApp: see and control calls through the system.
permissions.permlab_cameraOpenCloseListener: Allow an application or service to receive callbacks about camera devices being opened or closed.
permissions.permlab_companionProfileWatch: Companion Watch profile permission to manage watches
permissions.permlab_detectScreenCapture: detect screen captures of app windows
permissions.permlab_foregroundServiceCamera: run foreground service with the type \"camera\
permissions.permlab_foregroundServiceConnectedDevice: run foreground service with the type \"connectedDevice\
permissions.permlab_foregroundServiceDataSync: run foreground service with the type \"dataSync\
permissions.permlab_foregroundServiceFileManagement: run foreground service with the type \"fileManagement\
permissions.permlab_foregroundServiceHealth: run foreground service with the type \"health\
permissions.permlab_foregroundServiceLocation: run foreground service with the type \"location\
permissions.permlab_foregroundServiceMediaPlayback: run foreground service with the type \"mediaPlayback\
permissions.permlab_foregroundServiceMediaProjection: run foreground service with the type \"mediaProjection\
permissions.permlab_foregroundServiceMicrophone: run foreground service with the type \"microphone\
permissions.permlab_foregroundServicePhoneCall: run foreground service with the type \"phoneCall\
permissions.permlab_foregroundServiceRemoteMessaging: run foreground service with the type \"remoteMessaging\
permissions.permlab_foregroundServiceSpecialUse: run foreground service with the type \"specialUse\
permissions.permlab_foregroundServiceSystemExempted: run foreground service with the type \"systemExempted\
permissions.permlab_fullScreenIntent: display notifications as full screen activities on a locked device
permissions.permlab_highSamplingRateSensors: access sensor data at a high sampling rate
permissions.permlab_mediaLocation: read locations from your media collection
permissions.permlab_readBasicPhoneState: read basic telephony status and identity
permissions.permlab_readHistoryBookmarks: read your Web bookmarks and history
permissions.permlab_readMediaAudio: read audio files from shared storage
permissions.permlab_readMediaImages: read image files from shared storage
permissions.permlab_readMediaVideo: read video files from shared storage
permissions.permlab_readSms: read your text messages (SMS or MMS)
permissions.permlab_readVisualUserSelect: read user selected image and video files from shared storage
permissions.permlab_sdcardRead: read the contents of your shared storage
permissions.permlab_sdcardWrite: modify or delete the contents of your shared storage
permissions.permlab_systemAlertWindow: This app can appear on top of other apps
permissions.permlab_systemCamera: Allow an application or service access to system cameras to take pictures and videos
permissions.permlab_uwb_ranging: determine relative position between nearby Ultra-Wideband devices
permissions.permlab_writeCalendar: add or modify calendar events and send email to guests without owners' knowledge

donate.heading: Donate
donate.hellotux_donation: F-Droid will receive 3€ per shirt sold.
donate.powered_by_donations: F-Droid is powered by your donations!
